body.name: T-fal Signature Nonstick Fry Pan Set 8, 10.5 Inch Oven Safe 350F Cookware, Pots and Pans, Dishwasher Safe Black

features: Heat mastery system: T-fal heat mastery system is a three ingredient recipe for perfectly delicious cooking results every time…superior and longer-lasting non-stick coating, an anti-warping, even heat base and Patented Thermo-Spot technology.

Durable nonstick: scratch resistant and toxin free, hard Titanium reinforced nonstick interior stands up to frequent use and allows for cooking without frustrating, wasteful, stuck-on messes; supremely strong.
Thermo-spot indicator: The ring around the spot turns solid red to show when pans are properly preheated and ready for ingredients to be added—preheating is key to even cooking and sealing in flavor.
Comfortable handle: ergonomically designed heat-resistant handle provide a comfortable, secure grip; end holes for optional hanging.

Convenience & time-saving: the signature fry pans feature pouring edges for dripless serving and draining…measuring marks inside pots to save time and effortless A plastic fridge lid to make storing leftovers quick and convenient.
body.description: Bring style and ease to any home kitchen with T-fal signature Nonstick cookware. Perfect for new and seasoned cooks alike, t-fal’s heat mastery titanium nonstick, Thermo-Spot heat indicator and even heat base ensure that the cookware heats up quickly and distributes heat evenly. Signature’s durable, toxin-free titanium reinforced nonstick interior keeps food sliding smoothly across the surface for easy turning or flipping, and its nonstick exterior means no more frustrating stuck-on messes when it's time to cleanup. Even more, user-friendly T-fal cookware provides foolproof preheating. Its Thermo-Spot heat indicator features a ring around the center that turns solid Red to show when pans have reached a proper cooking temperature important step allows food to cook evenly and helps seal in the natural juices and flavor of food. For added convenience and time-saving, signature fry pans feature pouring edges for dripless serving and draining, measuring marks inside the pots to save time and effort and a fridge lid for one of the saucepans to make storing leftovers quick and convenient. Oven safe and dishwasher safe, T-fal signature offers a wide range of pots and pans to fry, Brown, sauté, steam, slow cook and more. From trademark favorites to adventurous new recipes, enjoy cooking at home with T-fal signature Nonstick cookware.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features and Benefits Durable Nonstick Interior Scratch resistant ProGlide nonstick interior stands up to frequent use Thermo-Spot Technology T-fal exclusive indicator shows when the pan is perfectly preheated and ready to begin cooking Comfortable Handles Ergonomically designed heat-resistant handles provide a comfortable, secure grip and are oven safe up to 350°F Dishwasher Safe Easy to clean

About T-fal For more than 60 years, T-fal has aspired to make the lives of busy home cooks easier by providing ingenious, high-performing and user-friendly cookware that enables a shortcut to desired results, every time. It all started with a simple idea: a non-stick pan that would revolutionize food preparation, transfer and clean up -- allowing you to spend more time enjoying little moments with those you love. Today, as the industry leader in non-stick cookware, T-fal continuously strives to develop innovative product solutions that remove the guesswork and stress in the kitchen – such as T-fal Thermo-Spot - the unique heat indicator technology that shows when the pan is perfectly preheated and ready to begin cooking. T-fal is part of the Groupe SEB global family of brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pans! T-Fal rocks. Heats quickly and evenly, EASY to clean! Fairly indestructible
reviews.reviewText: Great pans! T-Fal rocks. Heats quickly and evenly, EASY to clean!I tried reheating some water in a dirty pan (to loosen up the mess before cleaning) and made the mistake of walking away from the stove - the water cooked off, left with a burnt pan! I let the pan cool down, added more water and heated it again - under a more watchful eye! The burned n gunk wiped right out of the pan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice non-stick fry pans
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with the T-fal Signature fry pans. The non-stick ability is good, but a spray of oil is still very helpful. The pans heat evenly and clean up easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These T-fal fry pans are off the charts in performance. I've tried a fair number of non-stick cookware items from different makers, and this is definitely one of the best buys I've made. I use theses basically every day, sometimes more than once, and they are both working like the day I received them! Rarely ever have a non-stick last this long, and still not a scratch or mark on either one- amazing.Good buy, good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These frying pans are awesome!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been searching forever for some decent frying pans. I’ve spent money on expensive pans as well as cheap pans and they all seem to be the same as far as durability. I’ve had these for a while now and I love them! They distribute heat perfectly and are super easy to clean. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I had a set of calphalon cookware, it's heavy & everything sticks to it. I had a set of t-fal years ago (lasted me 20 years) & decided to go back to t-fal. These are lightweight, don't stick, but have the feel of a quality pan. My husband loves them so much he told me to throw out all my old pans & get more t-fal pans. Great product and well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are the best non stick pans I've ever had. Had them for over a year. The non stick is still perfect and eggs still slide out perfectly. The reason for this review is that the bottoms chip and will scratch your glass top stove. Too bad because I just love them to cook in. They need to fix this problem. The one I used almost every day started chipping after the first month and continuously got worse so I started using the second one more often. Only after a few uses its chipping also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Is a good material ! Duradero ! No pega es buen teflon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these pans, the nonstick is great and pans heat evenly. Have made sure to hand wash only to preserve the nonstick and have had no issues. They will scratch with metal utensils, but any pans besides stainless steel will. Have had these several months now and no complaints.

Me gustaron mucho. Son muy gruesos.No me gusta la política de comprar a un precio y al día siguiente verlos más baratos.Está bien en fechas especiales pero nos sentimos defraudados como consumidores con sus tarifas dinámicas.
Dans l’ensemble, je trouve ce produit de bonne qualité mais très solide.Il fait le travail pour ce qui a été conçu.
Excelentes sartenesCubierta gruesa de teflónProfundos.De buen tamañoExelente precio/Calidad
Tienen muy buen grosor. Y cumplen su función. Muchas gracias. Sin duda volveré a comprar..
El precio adecuado. Nada se les pega. Ya los he usado antes. Y volví a comprarlos ahora para mi hija.
